sentences.sContent: Objective To explore the anti-inflammatory and analgesic action of Yantongxiao unguent.
sentences.sContent_eng: Objective To explore the anti-inflammatory and analgesic action of Yantongxiao unguent.
sentences.sCn: 目的观察炎痛消软膏的抗炎镇痛作用。

sentences.sContent: METHODS:100 patients of vaginitis were treated with unguent Kushen randomly by single blind.
sentences.sContent_eng: METHODS:100 patients of vaginitis were treated with unguent Kushen randomly by single blind.
sentences.sCn: 方法：采用随机单盲方法，应用苦参软膏治疗阴道炎1 0 0例。

sentences.sContent: OBJECTIVE:To study the influence package on weight and appearance and active ingredient content of unguent.
sentences.sContent_eng: OBJECTIVE:To study the influence package on weight and appearance and active ingredient content of unguent.
sentences.sCn: 前言： 目的：考察包装对医院外用软膏制剂重量、外观性状和有效成分含量的影响。

trans.tranOther: an oily substance used on your skin
